instruction: Come up with a poem about urban lifestyle
output:
In the streets of the city, the air is so thick
The hustle and bustle of life, no time to sit
The crowds and the noise, a 24/7 beat
Sometimes we forget what a walk in nature can bring

Adrift in a sea of concrete, a view of a skyline so grand
The shops and the restaurants, the parks and the sand
We work hard and play hard, our dreams to fulfill
The urban lifestyle, with its highs and its lows, our stories to tell
